pr_title: New sound stuff, fish hook predicate, missed persistent state uuid fix

timeline.author: Runemoro
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27,6 +28,11 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1536 net/minecraft/entity/projectile/FishingBobberEnti
 		ARG 2 owner
 		ARG 3 lureLevel
 		ARG 4 luckOfTheSeaLevel
+	METHOD method_26086 isOpenOrWaterAround (Lnet/minecraft/class_2338;)Z
+		ARG 1 pos
+	METHOD method_26087 isOpenOrWater (Lnet/minecraft/class_2338;)Z

replies.bodyText: Returns whether this block is air or water/waterlogged.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: This is called by isOpenOrWaterAround in a blockpos stream in a 5 * 3 * 5 area to ensure in this area there is no artificial blocks. Looks like the fix for fishing machine.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Maybe clarify that this is for sounds?
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,6 +48,7 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_746 net/minecraft/client/network/ClientPlayerEntity
 	METHOD method_22419 showsDeathScreen ()Z
 	METHOD method_22420 setShowsDeathScreen (Z)V
 		ARG 1 shouldShow
+	METHOD method_26269 getMoodPercentage ()F

replies.bodyText: See slicelime's intro vid for 20w12a. On the debug screen, it says Mood: 8%. Should I clarify in javadocs instead?
replies.author: liach

timeline.message:
New sound stuff, fish hook predicate, missed persistent state uuid fix

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

Add jd to note this is the mood percentage for biome sound
